name: Bank of America Corporation Preferred Stock
description: Bank of America Corporation (BAC) is one of the largest financial institutions in the United States, providing a wide range of banking, investment, asset management, and other financial and risk management products and services. Founded in 1904 and headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina, Bank of America serves approximately 66 million consumer and small business clients through a variety of channels, including a network of approximately 4,300 retail financial centers and over 16,000 ATMs. The bank is known for its comprehensive suite of financial services, which includes banking, investment banking, insurance, mortgage lending, and wealth management. The preferred stock, designated as BAC.PRP, represents a specific class of ownership in the bank, typically offering fixed dividends and priority over common stock in the event of liquidation. Bank of America is committed to responsible growth by focusing on environmental sustainability, community development, and economic mobility. The bank has made significant investments in technology to enhance customer experience and improve operational efficiency, positioning itself as a leader in digital banking solutions. With a strong emphasis on corporate social responsibility, Bank of America actively supports initiatives that foster economic opportunity, environmental sustainability, and community development.
